dmca.title: Playboy DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Hello,

We have received a DMCA complaint from Playboy regarding alleged copyright
images at the following URLs:

http://adultcollections.blogspot.com/2006/02/bobbi-hart.html

http://fromaroundtheworld.blogspot.com/

http://normsfoxes.blogspot.com/2006/01/bobbi-hart.html
The DMCA complaint is attached. Thanks!

--
Alice Wu  |  Web Products  |  Legal Support
Google Inc.  |  1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View  |  CA  |  94043
650.253.0688 voice  |  650.618.1806 facsimile  alicewu@google.com
PLAYBOY ENTERPRISES INTERNATIONAL, INC. 
Facsimile Transmission Sheet 
PRIVILEGED AND CONFIDENTIAL 
To: Google Inc. / Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints 
From: Tatyana Cherkashina / Intellectual Property Assistant 
Date: April 25, 2006 
Fax No.: 650-618-1499 
Total Pages (including cover): 4 
Message: 
Please see attached 
[redacted] Lake Shore Drive, Chicago, Illinois 60611 
Telephone 312.751.8000 
tOO/LOOd 99U 68:EL 9OO/9/tO IN]HIHVId]G MV1 Aoa&v1d:i 
PLATOY K PSYS &flThM€A WC. 
April 25, 2006 
Via Facsimile (650.618.1499) 
Google, Inc. 
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway 
Mountain View, CA 94043 
Dear Sir or Madam: 
It has been brought to our attention that web pages at www.blogspot.com (66.102.15.100) display, without authorization, reproductions of images owned by Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. (``Playboy''). All right, title and interest in and to these images belongs to Playboy. 
I believe in good faith that the disputed images displayed on www.blogspot.com (66.102.15.1 00) are not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law. 
Accordingly, please remove the unauthorized reproductions of Playboy copyrighted images on www.blogspot.comj66.102.15.100) and on all web pages under your control. 
Examples of the copyrighted material can be found at the following links:

I, Tatyana Cherkashina, under penalty of perjury, am authorized to act on behalf of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. in regard to the above-mentioned unauthorized reproduction of the Playboy copyrighted images. My contact information is as follows: 
Playboy Enterprises International, Inc., [redacted] Lakeshore Drive, Chicago, Illinois 60611, Fax [redacted], phone [redacted] E-mail address is tcherkashina@playboy.com. 
We look forward to hearing from you and resolving this matter immediately. 
This letter is not intended to and shall not waive or prejudice any rights and remedies that Playboy may have at law, in equity or otherwise. Any and all such rights and remedies are hereby expressly reserved. 
PLAYBOY ENTERPRISES INTERNATIONAL, INC. 
Tatyana Cherkashina 
Intellectual Property Assistant 
cc: Anamaria E. Cashman, Esq.
